programme.short_synopsis: As Britain faces a General Election, questions over possible Reagan second term.
programme.medium_synopsis: Mrs Thatcher hopes for a second term - eyes are now on Reagan to see if he will do the same.
programme.long_synopsis:
Mrs Thatcher hopes for a second term - eyes are now on Reagan to see if he will do the same.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
